resources.string:
The app utilizes www.metaweather.com RESTful web api allowing search for location and weather forecast.

 Main screen shows the list of locations and corresponding WOEID (Where On Earth IDentifier). Click on location item in the list to view 6 days forecast. Use floating action button to toggle search functionality on/off and add new locations to the list.

 Note: data persistence layer will be implemented in the next release. Contact the author for additional info.

"BellWeather 5-days Forecast (V1.01) developed by Dr. Alexander Bell for Demo purpose.

Note: For privacy/security reason, this app does NOT implement GPS device location tracking. Contact the author for additional info.
